sen.j: 山城地区（やましろちく）とは、京都府南部の山城国のうち、宇治市以南にある12市町村を指す。
sen.e: Of Yamashiro Province in Kyoto Prefecture, the Yamashiro area indicates the twelve cities, towns and vilage located in the south of Uji City.
Yamashiro Province in Kyoto Prefecture, represents the twelve cities, towns and vilages located in the south of Uji City.
Yamashiro Province in Kyoto Prefecture, represents the twelve cities, towns and villages located in the south of Uji City.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 大阪府、奈良県、滋賀県、三重県に隣接する。
sen.e: The area borders Osaka Prefecture, Nara prefecture, Shiga Prefecture and Mie Prefecture.
The area borders Osaka Prefecture, Nara prefecture, Shiga Prefecture and Mie Prefecture.
The area borders Osaka Prefecture, Nara prefecture, Shiga Prefecture and Mie Prefecture.

sen.j: 衆議院の選挙区で京都府第6選挙区
sen.e: In selecting members of the house of Representatives, it belongs to the sixth electral district of Kyoto Prefecture.
In selecting members of the house of Representatives, it belongs to the sixth electral district of Kyoto Prefecture.
In selecting members of the House of Representatives, it belongs to the sixth electoral district of Kyoto Prefecture.
The taxes there are handled by the Uji tax office
The taxes are handled by the Uji tax office
The taxes are handled by the Uji Tax Office.

sen.j: 固定電話の市外局番が八幡市、宇治市のごく一部、久御山町の半分、相楽郡笠置町、南山城村を除き0774であること。
sen.e: The area number for the fixed-line telephones is 0774 except small areas of Yawata City and of Uji City, a half of Kumiyama-cho Town, Kasagi-cho Town of Souraku County and Minami-yamashiro Village.
The area number for fixed-line telephones is 0774 except for small areas of Yawata City and Uji City, half of Kumiyama-cho Town, Kasagi-cho Town of Souraku County and Minami-yamashiro Village.
The area core for fixed-line telephones is 0774 except for small areas of Yawata City and Uji City, half of Kumiyama-cho, Kasagi-cho of Soraku-gun and Minami-yamashiro-mura.
sen.cmt: town, county など削除しました。Area code としました。

sen.j: 近鉄京都線、JR大和路線・奈良線・片町線、京阪本線、京阪宇治線の沿線。
sen.e: The Kintetsu Kyoto Line, JR Yamato Line/Nara Line/Katamachi Line, Keihan Main line and Keihan Uji Line run tthrough this area.
The Kintetsu Kyoto Line, JR Yamato Line/Nara Line/Katamachi Line, Keihan Main line and Keihan Uji Line run tthrough this area.
The Kintetsu Kyoto Line, JR Yamato Line/Nara Line/Katamachi Line, Keihan Main line and Keihan Uji Line run through this area.

sen.j: 国道1号、国道24号、国道163号、国道307号の沿線。
sen.e: National road 1, national road 24, national road 163 and national road 307 run through this area.
National road 1, national road 24, national road 163 and national road 307 run through this area.
National Route 1, National Route 24, National Route 163 and National Route 307 run through this area.

sen.j: 宇治川、木津川 (京都府)の流域。
sen.e: Uji-gawa River and Kizu-kawa River (in Kyoto Prefecture) flow through the area.
Uji-gawa River and Kizu-kawa River (in Kyoto Prefecture) flow through the area.
Uji-gawa River and Kizu-kawa River (Kyoto Prefecture) flow through the area.

sen.j: 一部では関西文化学術研究都市などの日本のニュータウンが開発され、京都市都心や大阪市都心へのベッドタウンとして人口が急増している。
sen.e: New towns in Japan, such as Kansai Science City, have been developed in part of the area, where commuters to the central areas of Kyoto City and of Osaka City have become lived, making the population there increase rapidly.

New towns in Japan, such as Kansai Science City, have been developed in parts of the area, where people live and commute to the central areas of Kyoto City and Osaka City, causing an increase in the population.

New towns in Japan, such as Kansai Science City, have been developed in parts of the area, where people live and commute to the central areas of Kyoto City and Osaka City, causing an increase in the population.

sen.j: 1988年以降は京滋バイパスや第二京阪道路や京奈和自動車道が相次いで開通し、自動車交通のアクセスも改善されつつある。
sen.e: Since 1988, KEIJI BY-PASS, the second Keihan road and REINAWA EXPRESSWAY have opened one after another, improving acces to the area by vehicle.
Since 1988, KEIJI BY-PASS, the second Keihan road and REINAWA EXPRESSWAY have opened one after another, improving access to the area by vehicle.
Since 1988, KEIJI BY-PASS, the second Keihan road and KEINAWA EXPRESSWAY have opened one after another, improving access to the area by vehicle.

sen.j: この地区の人口は60万人で鳥取県に匹敵する。
sen.e: The population of this area is 600 thousands, being almost equal to that of Tottori Prefecture.
The population of this area is 600 thousand, being almost equal to that of Tottori Prefecture.

sen.j: 山城地区の郵便番号は基本的に610番台である（宇治市には601～地域がある）。
sen.e: The postal code of the Yamashiro area are bisically between 610 and 619 (with 601 to 609 in some areas of Uji City).

sen.j: 郵便番号600～619地域は京都中央郵便局の管轄である。
sen.e: The areas with the postal codes of 600 to 619 are under control of the Kyoto central post office.
The areas with the postal codes of 600 to 619 are under control of the Kyoto central post office.
